entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
